Entry.title: Server-&URL
Entry.tooltip: The URL of the delegate server to route the transfer through.

Entry.title: &Exit after transfer
Entry.tooltip: If activated, the application will quit automatically after informing you that data was transfered to a partner.

Entry.title: Automatically &send on paste
Entry.tooltip: If activated, the application will automatically start the transfer if valid data was pasted in the QR-View.
Entry.Property: Send data to partner if valid data was pasted

Entry.title: Default &transfer entries
Entry.tooltip: Select the entries you would like to be transfered to the partner by default. When starting a transfer from Keepass those will be selected.
